get.summary: Gets a list of Documents or a single Document matching the Id.

post.summary: Creates a new Document or DocumentApproval.

patch.summary: Updates a Document or DocumentApproval based on the user privilege. Id is required.

delete.summary: Deletes any Document or DocumentApproval with a matching Id.

get.summary: Gets EM/PM items. Filter the item using Id.

delete.summary: Detach a file from an entity.

get.summary: Get data on a specific monitor
Get monitors for a procedure step
Get procedure step template by Id
Get one or all procedure types

post.summary: Creates a Product based on the  request.
Creates a Quote based on the  request.

delete.summary: Deletes a Quote based on the  parameter

get.summary: Returns a summary of COMPLETED or CANCELLED WorkOrders
Returns a summary of WorkOrders IN PROGRESS or WAITING
Returns the WorkOrders that are either waiting to start or in Process.

200.description: The WorkOrders that are either waiting to start or in Process

get.summary: Get work order list by id, customerid, locationid, or date

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Get work orders by customer ID

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Get work orders by location ID

parameters.name: invoiceDate
parameters.description: Get work orders by invoice Date

parameters.name: assignedToId
parameters.description: Get work orders with ANY tasks assigned to this user ID
